message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this excellent product for the price of $13,500.  I think it will be very valuable for you, and this is a fair price.
Alice, $13,500 is far too high for me. I'm only willing to pay $8,500 for this product. This is a fair price considering the value to me. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I appreciate you making an offer.  $13,500 might have been a bit high, so I'm willing to come down to $11,500. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value and I'm keen to work out a deal.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $11,500 is still too high for me.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $8,500.  This product is valuable to me, but I'm not willing to pay more than that.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Bob, I understand your position, but I need a price that reflects the true value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $10,000? This is my final offer.
